Augment.Name: Melancholic Flames (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Adamantine material type. On hit: 2d6 Fire Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Chill (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Cold Iron material type. On hit: 2d6 Cold Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Sparks (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Silver material type. On hit: 2d6 Electric Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Acid (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Crystal and Byeshk material type. On hit: 2d6 Acid Damage.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Dimlight (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +5 Enhancement bonus to Spell Penetration. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +1 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Shadows (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +5% Enhancement bonus to Spell Cost Reduction. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +1 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Arcana (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +41 Equipment bonus to all Spellpowers. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +1 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Flames (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Flaming. This effect causes the edges of this weapon to burn with enchanted flames, dealing 6d6 Fire damage on each critical hit.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Chill (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Freezing. This effect causes the edges of this weapon to become frozen to the touch, dealing 6d6 Ice damage on each critical hit.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Sparks (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Jolting. This effect causes the edges of this weapon to arc with electricity, dealing 6d6 Lightning damage on each critical hit.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Acid (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Corroding. This effect causes the edges of this weapon to drip with acid, dealing 6d6 Acid damage on each critical hit.

Augment.Name: Dreadful Arcana (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +2 Equipment bonus to all Spell DCs. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2% Exceptional bonus to Spell Critical Chance and makes the Quarterstaff an Implement.

Augment.Name: Miserable Flames (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Strength.

Augment.Name: Miserable Chill (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Wisdom.

Augment.Name: Miserable Sparks (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Charisma.

Augment.Name: Miserable Acid (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Constitution.

Augment.Name: Miserable Dimlight (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Intelligence.

Augment.Name: Miserable Shadows (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Exceptional bonus to Dexterity.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Acid (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Acid Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Cold (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Cold Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Electric (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Electric Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Fire (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Fire Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Force (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Force and Physical Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Light (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Light and Alignment Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Negative (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Negative Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Positive (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Positive Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Repair (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Repair Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Arcana: Sonic (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70 Equipment bonus to Sonic Spellpower.

Augment.Name: Miserable Destruction (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Your attacks apply a stack of Armor Destruction. -1 penalty to Armor Class, -1% of its Fortification. 20 Second Duration. Stacks up to 15 times. This effect may trigger once every three seconds.

Augment.Name: Miserable Maiming (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Maiming. When you score a critical hit with this weapon, it does an additional +2d8 damage.

Augment.Name: Miserable Humanoid Bane (Heroic)
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to those that walk among us, dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Humanoids

Augment.Name: Miserable Monstrous Humanoid Bane (Heroic)
Augment.Description: This weapon is attuned specifically to hunt those who are descended from monsters dealing an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Monstrous Humanoids.

Augment.Name: Miserable Undead Bane (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Those that have died must return, and this weapon is attuned specifically to lay them to rest. This weapon deals an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Undead.

Augment.Name: Miserable Vermin Bane (Heroic)
Augment.Description: This weapon is ideal for cleaning out rats and other annoying beasts. It deals an additional 2d10 bane damage vs. Vermin.

Augment.Name: Miserable Armor-Piercing (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Adds Armor-Piercing. +8% Enhancement bonus to bypass enemy Fortification.

Augment.Name: Melancholic False Life (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +18 Enhancement bonus to Maximum HP.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Quality Combat Mastery (Heroic)

Augment.Description: +12 Enhancement bonus to Physical Resistance Rating.

Augment.Name: Woeful Resistance (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +4 Resistance bonus to all Saving Throws.

Augment.Name: Woeful Enhanced Ghostly (Heroic)
Augment.Description: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee and missile attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to your incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Augment.Name: Woeful Relentless Fury (Heroic)
Augment.Description: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enhancement damage bonus to your melee, ranged, and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Augment.Name: Woeful Armor-Piercing (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +8% Enhancement bonus to Fortification bypass.

Augment.Name: Woeful Wizardry (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +96 Enhancement bonus to Maximum SP.

Augment.Name: Woeful Profane DCs (Heroic)
Augment.Description: You have a +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Woeful Sacred DCs (Heroic)
Augment.Description: You have a +1 Sacred bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Device (Heroic)
Augment.Description: You have Deathblock and are Ghostly.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Plating (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +70% Enhancement bonus to Fortification.

Augment.Name: Melancholic Converter (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +19 Competence bonus to Positive Healing Amplification +19 Enhancement bonus to Repair Healing Amplification +19 Profane bonus to Negative Healing Amplification

Augment.Name: Melancholic Booster (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +3% Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Lore.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Silencer (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1d6 Profane bonus to your Sneak Attack Dice.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Invigorator (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +1 Profane bonus to Spell DCs, Tactical DCs, and Assassinate.

Augment.Name: Dolorous Voidwheel (Heroic)
Augment.Description: +5 Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Power.
